1.title: The start

11.content: Who is shido shrunk around?
11.title: Shido Itsuka

choices: In my boot (She could or not keep him as pet)
In my mouth (She could or not keep him as pet)
114.content:
One day, after school Shido was going to the shopping area to buy some supplies for dinner, when suddenly he saw Kurumi in the corner of his eye, as usual she was smiling to him from afar slowly walking backwards and disappearing into the shadows of an alley.

Not losing any time Shido ran behind her, for Shido Kurumi was little spooky for her lack of good wiling, and some predatory behaviors, but still a gentle girl that must be saved from her own evil behavior's, and her uncontrollable spirit powers.

However when Shido reached the alley he didn't see anyone, suddenly he started to get sleepy, without any apparent explanation until he passed out.

After a while he wake up and looked around, he saw an open sky above him still with daylight even if it was already getting dark, so he saw beautiful sunset sky, around was a wide plain and far away from him was many huge bars like some kind of cell or some kind handrail but both options where impossible due to the enormous size, if was a cell any person or animal easily could pass through the space between the bars, and for a handrail was too tall for any person, while pondering the use of such structure shido also noticed an enormous building with a gigantic single door, and he started to realize what happened, when Shido heard a giggle behind him.

"Oh Shido-kun are you awake already." a Misterious yet familiar voice said. Shido turned and inmediately fell on his back when he saw the gargantuan figure of Kurumi. "Wow easy there, I don't want my itsy bitsy Shido hurt, come here let me pick you up." Kurumi said with a smirk, pinching Shido bottom half between her thumb and forefinger in a gentle manner, but sill with enough strength to prevent Shido from falling or escaping, she carried Shido to eye level, taking him closer to the eye with a clock in it studying Shido intently.

Shido trembling from the unexpected situation started to speak "Wha what happened?, why you shrunk me where are we? !let me go!" Shido shout with fear.

"Shhh little Shido, I didn't shrunk you but saw you when happened, you suddenly fell unconscious and started to get smaller until you reached the one inch limit, then I took you here to the closer roof top to ensure nobody see's us, and let you sleep until you woke up" Kurumi said squeezing Shido playfully with the fingers she was holding him, she also licked her lips with a predatory eyes.

"Em yeah? then why were you there? and if you didn't shrunk me, then who?" Shido aked not entirely conviced about what Kurumi said.

"Oh is that so, you don't belive me hm, well the reason I was there is because, I know many things in the future and in the past remember." She said pointing at the eye with the clock with her other hand. "And about who did it Im not sure but I think that you lost some spiritual powers from the other spirits, but this time instead of actually losing their abilities you lost your size." Kurumi said a little annoyed because Shido didn't believe her.

"Oh really let me try." Shido said summoning Sandalphon the sword of Thoka, but instead of summoning the normal sword Shido had a micro version which fit in his hands, after confirm that he still had the spirits powers at least a mini version of them, he dispelled the sword again. "You are right I still have their powers, I'm sorry for not believing in you."

"You think a simple apology is enough" she said sticking her tongue out at Shido.

"You are right I'm terrible sorry I will make it up to you as soon I'm back to my size" Shido said with regret, and bowing her head towards Kurumi.

"Aw I can't be mad at you my little Shido" Kurumi said petting Shido carelessly."However its very tempting to keep you as my sweet pet instead" Kurumi said looking at Shido with predatory eyes again.

"Haha please don't joke like that and take me to home please I need to talk to Kotori to see what we can do about this" Shido sai nervously hoping that Kurumi was actually joking.

"Oh Shido dont worry I will help you but I will punish you for not believing me so I will put you in my..."
114.title: Kurumi

choices: Kotori takes Shido to the Fraxinus.
Kurumi keeps Shido for hersel at least for now.
1141.content:
Kurumi then proceeded to remove her right boot and put Shido on the heel area. "If I were you little Shido I would run to the toes area"

Hearing this and understanding his situation, Shido run as fast as he could deeper in the boot, but after just a little and with a terrible tremble of the boot Shido fell and rolled, luckily for him he almost reached the toe area when this happened, turning just in time to receive a socked third toe smashing him into the toe imprint underneath him.

Kurumi smiled happily feeling the struggles of Shido under her toes, "Haha that tickles, Shido stop" Kurumi said stomping her right foot, which worked for a moment and the struggle came back harder. Oh well isn't so bad after you get used to it actually feels pretty pleasant. Kurumi thought for herself.

Shido in other hand was breathing heavily, because of the immense weight and the sock fivers suffocating him, however he noticed that he was in one piece safe and sound, well maybe those where strong word's, considering his circumstances, but thanks to the power of his sister Kotori he was healing fast enough to prevent any damage, at the end he only was in a constricted situation but safe.

Kurumi seriously considered whether to keep Shido for herself, but in the end she decided against that idea and decided to go with Kotori. However she decided to enjoy her time with shido, taking her time to go to Shido home visiting stores and arcades in the way enjoying avery step she took with Shido in her boot.

For Shideo this consisted on get smashed repeatedly under Kurumi toes, bouncing around inside boot, and getting squeezed playfully whenever kurumi stopped walking to play at an arcade machine or checking out an a store.

Finally Kurumi decide to go to Shido's home, when she was near his home Kurumi started to walk carefully and stealthy not wanting to start a fight with any of the spirits who lived next Shido's home, she entered Shido's home through the window of Shido's room, there Kurumi sat in the bed and relaxed a little since avoided any conflict.

In that moment Kotori entered Shido's room demanding an explanation to Shido since he had not answered her call´s, but stopped mid word when she noticed that in place of his brother was Kurumi a dangerous spirit to her eyes

"What are you doing in my house? and why the satellite locator of the Fraxinus say's that Shido is in here?" Kotori said getting ready to fight and summoning her astral dress.

"Hey slow down im here because im helping Shido." Said Kurumi taking some step behind, "Well and also Im punishing him" this last's word's she whispered only for herself.

"Yeah and why I should belive you?" Kotori asked in guard.

"Let me explain, he shrunk somehow and I found him and Im keeping an eye on him since" Kurumi said.

Kotori wasn't convinced about Kurumi good will however this coincided with the data of the Fraxinus, one of the major reasons why she wanted to contact him earlier. "If is that so the where is he?" Kotori asked hesitantly.

"Oh that it's easy I store him in my boot for safekeeping" Kurumi answered leaving out the punishment part. "Here let me show you" Kurumi said sitting back on Shido's bed and squeezing Shido with her toes, trying to get a good grab on him, finally trapping him under her second toe in a vice.

Kurumi then took her foot along with Shido out of her boot, and unstuck him from her toes, and showed him to Kotori who gasped in surprise.

"What the, Shido its really you?" Kotori asked. Mhm this is weird normally the spirits just gather their powers back, and Shido is left as a normal person without powers but this time the spirits gathered their powers back and instead of leave Shido like normal person he stayed with powers too, and shrunken instead. Kotori thought for herself.

"Yeah I'm more or less fine, all thing's considered." Shido said staying on Kurumi's palm.

"Why do you took him back to me then, you could easily take him and nobody would know?" Kotori asked to Kurumi distrustful.

1. "For fun actually I wanted to know what you and the other spirits are gonna do with little Shido here." Kurumi responded.

"is that so? Well, if that's the case, I'll take him to the Fraxinus so they can analyze him before anything else." Kotori said.

2. "I won't let go of him so easily, I just wanted to let you and the other spirits know that Shido is fine and is with me" Kurumi said and with this she entered her Shadow and disappeared taking Shido with her.

3. "Because I have a fun idea I got it when felt Shido squirming in my boot, lets invite the other spirits for this. The game is this we gonna leave all our shoes in front of Shido, and we will not look giving Shido a minute or so to hide in one of our shoes, the lucky girl with Shido in her shoe can take a date with him, the next day we gonna do the same removing the shoes of the girl who already had a date, we will continue until every Spirit had her date with Shido, then we start all over again at least until he gets back to normal." Kurumi explained with a mischievous smile towards Shido who was terrified at Kurumi's suggestion.

"Well isn't a bad idea actually, he maybe recovers his height with the dates alone since the connection between we the spirits and he get stronger with dates anyway, and sounds like a fair method to let all have a date with him so I will accept your game idea then." Kotori said sucking her lollipop.
1141.title: In Kurumi's boot

11531.content:
Which personality of miku is shido shrunk around for those who dont know
Pre sealed shes sees all humans as toys for her amusement and men in particular she sees as less than bugs thus she couldnt stand the sight of shido
Post sealed she his typically kinder and is extremely attached to shido in particular
11531.title: Miku

14.content: Who you are shrunk around?
14.title: You

144.content: who are you shrunk around
144.title: Kaguya and or Yuzuru

choices: you agreed to be their pet
you agreed to be their tiny boyfriend
you agreed to be their slave
1443.content:
(originally written by lover of all gaintess added here with permission ( https://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/v...)


“Kaguya, don’t drop him. He won’t survive the fall so be careful.”

“I know, i’m just trying to be careful, I promise he won’t fall.”

“Hold him with two hands, if you really want that?”

What are you hearing, this was... odd? You were waking up, shifting your body as you were left so confused about the manner. Who were these girls? What were they talking about, and... where were you.

You try to wake up and look, but seeing nothing in front of you. Something was blocking your sight, and you have no idea what it was. It was tight, not only on your head by over your body as well. Did you wrap yourself in your blanket again? Well, maybe not since even your arms were tied.

You of course shift around, moving around and trying to break free, only to realise it was tighter than you thought. Eyes wide as you were filled with a panic.

Something these two girls realised. “Oh he’s up!”

“Struggling, get to the room quick.” The other voice said.

“Of course Miss, i’ll cary him.” She joked playing it up.

W-Wait... are you getting kidnapped! Eyes wide as you realise the danger you were in. You struggle and try to break free, but it was not like you could really do anything about it. You were just too small, too weak to do anything against your captor.

“Relax will you, we are almost there.”

Almost where, to your torture chambers! What are these two planning! Why... are you happy that it sounds like it’s two cute girls kidnapping you? No wait, you are just going crazy!

You hear a door open as suddenly it was closed within seconds.

Your prison broke free, and... you got a sight that was welcome.

She was beautiful, with a slim body and bright orange hair. She wore a school outfit on, a school sweater as well as a skirt. The smile she was sending you though, it calmed you down. You were in love in a literal second, something you thought would never happen.

“Hello there.” She smiled down, a big wide smile.

“H-Hey.” You say to her, when suddenly you heard footsteps coming over. You look, to see... her again.

The same beauty but... no this girl had some differences. Her smile wasn’t there and her eyes weren’t as friendly, but... there was something captivating about her, that just draws you in?

You’re small.” She said down, not much inflection in her voice. “I’m sure you haven’t realised it yet.”

“I-I’m what?” You question as you look around. You were small, you were actually small. you were on the happy one’s hand right now, which is big enough to be a bed for you! Comparing you to the rest of the room, you had to be a couple of inches tall!

Wow, small in the room of two giant and beautiful twins. This... this has to still be a dream right, cause it’s just too good to be true.

“I’m small?” You question to them. “How did this happen? W-Where did you girls find me?” You question to her just wanting to know.

“Well, I found you lying by yourself. I thought you were a bug and she tried to step on you.”

“I did.” The not so peppy one answered, as that left you worried.

“I found you though, and brought you here. Wow, you are so small. Are you human?”

“I mean, yeah I am. Just small, i’m not like a fairy or a pixie like that.” You say to her calmly.

“No, are you a-”

“He doesn’t know.” her sister said in a calm manner.

“Oh he doesn’t, well that’s weird.” Her sister said

“So...” You say with a curious eye.”You girls brought me here, well I need to tell you my name at the very least. “It is (Your Name)”

“Well my name is Kaguya Yamai!” She said with a smile, “And this is my sister Yuzuru.”

“H-Hey Yuzuru.” You say to her simply just trying to be kind to her. She looked at you, and wore a smile on her face

“Kaguya, can I talk to you in private?” her sister said. They all went away with you, as you were a bit worried about it.

“Sure, be right back little guy.” With that, she went ahead and moved away. Both sisters leaving the room as you were by yourself. A confused look as you worried. What were they talking about, obviously they were talking about you. A-Are they planning on kicking you out? You hope not, you have no idea where you were, and these girls were pretty. You really want to stay in them.

After several minutes they came around back in.

“S-So girls?” You say with a worried look. “What did you two talk about.”

“Oh, my sister here wanted to get rid of you.” yes your hopes were confirmed. Your eyes being shot wide open. “Don’t worry though, I talked her out of it.”

“You did, thank you and-” You looked at Yuzuru. You don’t really get the impression that she doesn’t like you. In fact you were not really sure how she was thinking and feeling?

“Don’t thank me just yet, for you to stay with us she wanted a specific rule in force.” Her energetic sister said.

“R-Really, and that is?”

“Well first I gotta know,” Kaguya said down to you with a smile, leaning her way over and staring at you with her beautiful eyes.

“Do you wanna stay with us (Your Name)?” She questioned down to you.

You looked at her for a couple of seconds, before accepting. “W-Well this is making me think it’s a pretty hectic thing but if I gotta be honest. But... i’ll stay, if your sister and you want me to.”

“Of course we do,” She smiled down. “Yuzuru was a little bit worried, but it’s fine now. Now that __________”
1443.title: Both
